system_summary: This system provides a web interface to browse and interact with event data, which is collected from external ticketing services by a backend API.

components.label: Frontend Web Application
components.role: Presents the user interface and interacts with the backend API to display event information.
components.visual_3d_object: A sleek, multi-faceted glass pane, subtly glowing, representing a web browser window.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'FRONTEND WEB APP' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Backend API Service
components.role: Manages core business logic, serves event data to the frontend, and orchestrates the collection of events from external sources.
components.visual_3d_object: A robust, obsidian-like cube, emanating a faint blue light, signifying a powerful API server.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'BACKEND API' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Events Database
components.role: Persists and stores event data collected and managed by the Backend API.
components.visual_3d_object: A shimmering, cylindrical data store, with segments representing data layers.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'EVENTS DATABASE' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: External Ticketmaster API
components.role: Provides a third-party API for sourcing live event data that the system integrates with.
components.visual_3d_object: A translucent, swirling cloud formation, representing an external, remote service.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'TICKETMASTER API' in bold white sans-serif font.

connections.label: Retrieves event data and sends user requests
